channel.title: Parallela on Simon Willshire
channel.description: Recent content in Parallela on Simon Willshire

item.title: Efficient Parallelism
item.description: Original Course Paper (2015) This paper was written for a distributed computer course (COIS-4350H) in 2015. It analyses the Parallela architecture using ARM and it’s MIMD coprocessor (Epiphany). Efficient Parallelism (PDF)
